en_question:
It is known that the vitamin and cholesterol content per unit of milk, beef, and eggs are shown in Table 4-15. Considering only these three foods, the following three goals are set:1.Meet the minimum daily requirement for three types of vitamins. 2.Minimize daily cholesterol intake. 3.Minimize daily food cost. The task is to formulate a goal programming model for this problem. 

\begin{table}[h]
    \centering
    \caption{Table 4-15: Nutritional Content of Foods (per 500g)}
    \renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.2}
    \begin{tabular}{c|ccc|c}
        \toprule
        Item & Milk(500g) & Beef(500g) & Eggs(500g) & Minimum Daily Requirement(mg) \\
        \midrule
        Vitamin A(mg) & 1 & 1 & 10 & 1 \\
        Vitamin C(mg) & 100 & 10 & 10 & 30 \\
        Vitamin D(mg) & 10 & 100 & 10 & 10 \\
        \midrule
        Cholesterol (units) & 70 & 50 & 120 & \\
        Cost (Yuan) & 1.5 & 8 & 4 & \\
        \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}
\end{table}
cn_question:
已知单位牛奶、牛肉、鸡蛋中的维生素及胆固醇含量等有关数据见表 4-15。如果只考虑这三种食物，并且设立了下列三个目标：

\begin{enumerate}
    \item 满足三种维生素的每日最小需要量；
    \item 使每日摄入的胆固醇最少；
    \item 使每日购买食品的费用最少。
\end{enumerate}

要求建立该问题的目标规划模型。

\begin{table}[h]
    \centering
    \caption{食品营养含量（表 4-15）}
    \renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.2}
    \begin{tabular}{c|ccc|c}
        \toprule
        项目 & 牛奶(500g) & 牛肉(500g) & 鸡蛋(500g) & 每日最小需要量(mg) \\
        \midrule
        维生素 A/mg & 1 & 1 & 10 & 1 \\
        维生素 C/mg & 100 & 10 & 10 & 30 \\
        维生素 D/mg & 10 & 100 & 10 & 10 \\
        \midrule
        胆固醇/单位 & 70 & 50 & 120 & \\
        费用/元 & 1.5 & 8 & 4 & \\
        \bottomrule
    \end{tabular}
\end{table}
